Class NetworkNode

java.lang.Object
NetworkNode
public class NetworkNode extends Object
This class provides functionality for the network nodes.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final String
    identifier
    This node's human friendly identifier
    (package private) ArrayList<String>
    innerAddresses
    Addresses of the network nodes this node knows about.
    private int
    lastRedirIndex
    keeps track of which node to redirect incoming connections to next if this node is full

    nodeTcpServer
    Communicates with any clients that want to use this node
    NodeUDPServer
    nodeUdpServer
    Communicates with other nodes
    (package private) ArrayList<String>
    outerAddresses
    Addresses of the network nodes this node knows about.
    (package private) HashMap<String,ResourceRequest>
    requestsInProgress
    Where String is order ID : clientIdentifier:sequentialNumber, holds requests that this node is currently processing
    (package private) HashMap<String,NetworkResource>
    resources
    Map of all resources this node has
    (package private) HashMap<String,NetworkSearch>
    searches
    An indexed map of all searches this node is conducting.

  • Field Details

    • identifier

      public final String identifier
      This node's human friendly identifier

    • silentMode

      public boolean silentMode
      Whether it should produce debug infromation

    • lastRedirIndex

      private int lastRedirIndex
      keeps track of which node to redirect incoming connections to next if this node is full

    • nodeTcpServer

      public TCPServer nodeTcpServer
      Communicates with any clients that want to use this node

    • nodeUdpServer

      public NodeUDPServer nodeUdpServer
      Communicates with other nodes

    • innerAddresses

      ArrayList<String> innerAddresses
      Addresses of the network nodes this node knows about. (Inner star table)

    • outerAddresses

      ArrayList<String> outerAddresses
      Addresses of the network nodes this node knows about. (Outer star table)

    • resources

      HashMap<String,NetworkResource> resources
      Map of all resources this node has

    • searches

      HashMap<String,NetworkSearch> searches
      An indexed map of all searches this node is conducting.

    • requestsInProgress

      HashMap<String,ResourceRequest> requestsInProgress
      Where String is order ID : clientIdentifier:sequentialNumber, holds requests that this node is currently processing

  • Constructor Details

    • NetworkNode

      public NetworkNode(String identifier, int tcpPort, String gatewayAddr, int gatewayPort, String resources)
      Primary constructor of the networkNode.
      Parameters:
      identifier - the name of the node
      tcpPort - the port that this node will listen at (both TCP for clients and UDP for other nodes)
      gatewayAddr - the address that this node will use to connect to the network
      gatewayPort - the port that this node will use to connect to the network
      resources - the resource string representing the resources on this

  • Method Details

    • printInfo

      private void printInfo(String info)
      Console information, with this node's identifier
      Parameters:
      info - the message to be sent to the console

    • processAddCmd

      private void processAddCmd(String addNodeAddrStr)
      Processes a command that adds a new node to our tables
      Parameters:
      addNodeAddrStr - contains the address/es of the new node to be added

    • getOwnAddressString

      private String getOwnAddressString()
      Get this machine's network address and port separated by a colon.
      Returns:
      a formtted string representing the network address

    • processNewNode

      private void processNewNode(ArrayList<String> addressTable, String newNodeAddrStr)
      Processes a new node that conntected to the network using this node.
      Parameters:
      addressTable - address table to add this node to. it will be outerAddresses if innerAddresses are full
      newNodeAddrStr - address of the new node

    • nodeConnected

      private void nodeConnected(String gatewayAddrStr)
      Handles an incoming node connection request
      Parameters:
      gatewayAddrStr - the new node's address formatted as ip:port

    • processResources

      private void processResources(String resourceString)
      Handles generating NetworkResource objects from a resource string for this node
      Parameters:
      resourceString - resource string formatted as resourceID:resourceAmount

    • processLock

      private void processLock(String commandArgs)
      Handles an incoming resource lock request
      Parameters:
      commandArgs - space separated list: sender address, request originator address, orderID, resource string (resourceID:resourceAmount)

    • requestSearchEnded

      private void requestSearchEnded(String commandArgs)
      Executed internally when search for available values has ended (received a FIN)
      Parameters:
      commandArgs - space separated list: sender address, request originator address, orderID, resource string (resourceID:resourceAmount) where the amount is the amount that was successfully locked

    • processRedirect

      private void processRedirect(String commandArgs)
      Retries connecting to a network once received a redirect command
      Parameters:
      commandArgs - the new address to connect to

    • processLockResponse

      private void processLockResponse(String commandArgs)
      Process a lock request. Either send more lock requests down our network, or deny/fulfill the request straight away.
      Parameters:
      commandArgs - space separated list: message sender address, request originator address, orderID, resource string (resourceID:resourceAmount) where the amount is the amount that was successfully locked.

    • processUnlock

      private void processUnlock(String commandArgs)
      Process a unlock command. Releases held resources to be available again.
      Parameters:
      commandArgs - resource string (resourceID:resourceAmount) for the resource(s) to be released.

    • processReservation

      private void processReservation(String argsStr)
      Process a reservation command. Makes the resources unavailable permanently and associates them with a specific client.
      Parameters:
      argsStr - clientID, resource string (resourceID:resourceAmount)

    • processRequestFail

      private void processRequestFail(ResourceRequest request)
      Process a request fail.
      Parameters:
      request - the request that has failed.

    • processLockSend

      private void processLockSend(ResourceRequest request, ArrayList<String> addresses)
      We are the originator and we are sending a first search or inner or outer adresses
      Parameters:
      request - the ResourceRequest we are sending this for
      addresses - the addresses we are sending this to

    • processLockSend

      private void processLockSend(String originator, String orderId, HashMap<String,Integer> requestedResources, ArrayList<String> addresses)
      Process sending a lock request(s) to specific addresses.
      Parameters:
      originator - request originator
      orderId - orderID
      requestedResources - resource string (that we are requesting)
      addresses - the addresses we are sending this to

    • printResources

      private void printResources()
      Diagonstic message about resources on this node.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method that creates the node object and proceses initialization arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - space separated dash prefixed runtime arguments.
